description: Lists all available Dataviews for a Dataset.

parameters.name: datasetId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the Dataset for which to retrieve Dataviews.

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: A token that indicates where a results page should begin.

nested_items.name: dataViews
nested_items.description: A list of Dataviews.

nested_items.name: dataViewId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier for the Dataview.

nested_items.name: dataViewArn
nested_items.description: The ARN identifier of the Dataview.

nested_items.name: datasetId
nested_items.description: Th unique identifier for the Dataview Dataset.

nested_items.name: asOfTimestamp
nested_items.description: Time range to use for the Dataview. The value is determined as epoch time in milliseconds. For example, the value for Monday, November 1, 2021 12:00:00 PM UTC is specified as 1635768000000.

nested_items.name: partitionColumns
nested_items.description: Ordered set of column names used to partition data.
(string) --- 1 - 255 character String.

nested_items.name: sortColumns
nested_items.description: Columns to be used for sorting the data.
(string) --- 1 - 255 character String.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The status of a Dataview creation.
RUNNING --- Dataview creation is running.
STARTING --- Dataview creation is starting.
FAILED --- Dataview creation has failed.
CANCELLED --- Dataview creation has been cancelled.
TIMEOUT --- Dataview creation has timed out.
SUCCESS --- Dataview creation has succeeded.
PENDING --- Dataview creation is pending.
FAILED_CLEANUP_FAILED --- Dataview creation failed and resource cleanup failed.

nested_items.name: errorInfo
nested_items.description: The structure with error messages.

nested_items.name: errorMessage
nested_items.description: The text of the error message.

nested_items.name: errorCategory
nested_items.description: The category of the error.
VALIDATION --- The inputs to this request are invalid.
SERVICE_QUOTA_EXCEEDED --- Service quotas have been exceeded. Please contact AWS support to increase quotas.
ACCESS_DENIED --- Missing required permission to perform this request.
RESOURCE_NOT_FOUND --- One or more inputs to this request were not found.
THROTTLING --- The system temporarily lacks sufficient resources to process the request.
INTERNAL_SERVICE_EXCEPTION --- An internal service error has occurred.
CANCELLED --- Cancelled.
USER_RECOVERABLE --- A user recoverable error has occurred.

nested_items.name: destinationTypeProperties
nested_items.description: Information about the Dataview destination.

nested_items.name: destinationType
nested_items.description: Destination type for a Dataview.
GLUE_TABLE --- Glue table destination type.
S3 --- S3 destination type.

nested_items.name: s3DestinationExportFileFormat
nested_items.description: Dataview export file format.
PARQUET --- Parquet export file format.
DELIMITED_TEXT --- Delimited text export file format.

nested_items.name: s3DestinationExportFileFormatOptions
nested_items.description: Format Options for S3 Destination type.
(string) ---
(string) ---

nested_items.name: autoUpdate
nested_items.description: The flag to indicate Dataview should be updated automatically.

nested_items.name: createTime
nested_items.description: The timestamp at which the Dataview was created in FinSpace. The value is determined as epoch time in milliseconds. For example, the value for Monday, November 1, 2021 12:00:00 PM UTC is specified as 1635768000000.

nested_items.name: lastModifiedTime
nested_items.description: The last time that a Dataview was modified. The value is determined as epoch time in milliseconds. For example, the value for Monday, November 1, 2021 12:00:00 PM UTC is specified as 1635768000000.
